comments: Leonard (MIA) establishes himself in a legal position in Ferguson's (OKC) path and he absorbs the oncoming contact during the pick.
Prior to making contact with the ball, Muscala (OKC) reaches in and makes contact to Herro's (MIA) face.
Hall (OKC) makes contact to Silva's (MIA) arm that affects his shot attempt near the rim.
Silva (MIA) makes marginal contact to the body of Ferguson (OKC) during his drive along the baseline.
Hill (MIA) makes incidental contact to Nader's (OKC) arm after the release of the ball that does not affect his jump shot attempt.
Hall (OKC) makes contact with the ball and cleanly blocks Herro's (MIA) driving shot attempt.
Ferguson (OKC) makes marginal contact with Herro's (MIA) body during his drive to the basket and shot attempt.
Leonard (MIA) is imminently exiting the lane within three seconds.
After the release of the pass, Nader (OKC) goes to not through Silva (MIA), who absorbs the incidental contact.
Muscala (OKC) is firming up and makes marginal contact with Hill (MIA) while setting the screen.
Silva (MIA) makes contact with Muscala's (OKC) leg on his follow through.
Prior to the inbound pass, Ferguson (OKC) and Herro (MIA) make mutual marginal contact as they briefly engage and disengage with each other off ball.
